main.bio: Dedicated and committed engineering manager and full stack developer graduated with over 7 years in overall work experience and 1 year as a Full-Stack Developer. Excellent interpersonal skills, open to working both independently of own initiative or as part of a successful team, with knowledge in different programming languages both Front-end and Back-End Technologies, organized, with a strong pipeline and achievement oriented. Web developer with a passion for web application development specially using React.js. Currently, looking to be a participant in a company development, where I can grow both professionally and personally, putting all my knowledge into practice.
